summary: A letter from a New York attorney to a US Attorney's Office regarding the Jeffrey Epstein investigation, providing information about a Swedish woman named Ms. [REDACTED] who allegedly procured young Swedish women for Epstein through an organization called BBB. The letter urges authorities to confront her during her visit to NYC.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Central figure in the investigation for abuse of young women; the letter discusses individuals who assisted him.

persons.name: Attorney General Barr
persons.context: Mentioned as having publicly stated his office would pursue everyone who assisted or conspired with Epstein.

persons.name: Ms. [REDACTED]
persons.context: A Swedish national alleged to have procured young Swedish women for Jeffrey Epstein through an organization called BBB; described as well-connected and having been a Swedish ambassador.

persons.name: Swedish Prince Carl Philip
persons.context: Mentioned as having been introduced to and married a soft porn star by Ms. [REDACTED].

connections.description: Allegedly procured young Swedish women for Epstein's 'pleasures' through the BBB organization.
Introduced a soft porn star to the prince, whom he later married.
JR identifies as a personal acquaintance of Ms. [REDACTED], and their life partner is as well.

events.title: Ms. [REDACTED] returns to US
events.description: Ms. [REDACTED] lands in NY/NJ, returning quietly to the US for several days.

events.title: Attorney General Barr's public statement
events.description: Attorney General Barr indicated his office would pursue everyone who assisted or conspired with Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: A Swedish woman, Ms. [REDACTED], is alleged to have procured young Swedish women for Jeffrey Epstein through an organization called 'BBB' (aka 'BBB').
Ms. [REDACTED] reportedly moved to Sweden when the Epstein investigation became public but returned to NYC on March 9, 2020.
The letter writer claims to have social media documented information about BBB and Ms. [REDACTED], noting that much content disappeared after AG Barr's statements.
Ms. [REDACTED] is described as well-connected in Swedish royal and NYC elite circles and has been a Swedish ambassador.
The letter urges the US Attorney's Office to confront Ms. [REDACTED] during her US visit before she returns to Sweden.
